sentences.en: He has claimed he can levitate.
sentences.cn: 他声称自己可以悬浮在空中。

sentences.en: I often dream that I can levitate.
sentences.cn: 我经常梦想我能够飞起来在空中飘浮.

sentences.en: Levitate now costs 3 % of base mana.
sentences.cn: 漂浮术将消耗3%的基础法力.

sentences.en: The guru claimed that he could levitate.
sentences.cn: 这位灵性导师声称他能够浮在空中.

trans.tran_en: to rise and float in the air by magic, or to make someone or something do this
